name: Gravity Racer (Oscaro55)
description:
Speed through this Sci-Fi racing game inspired by F-Zero as fast as possible, even gravity cannot hold you back ! Gravity Racer is a game about precision and understanding the physics of your vehicle, where every second count if you wish to be the best !

Controls (Azerty) :

- Z : Forward

- Q // D : Turn

- S // LeftShift : Break

- Space : Respawn at the last checkpoint

- R : Start a new lap

My name is Oscar Duponchel and i'm a second year programming student at E-Artsup in paris. I made this game alone in roughly 4 months. Here is the list of everything i have used for this project that i didn't make myself, as well as the link to the GitHub of this project. Enjoy !

- Music : Mute City, F-Zero Gx, nintendo

- YughuesFreeMaterials : Materials bundlefrom the unity asset store

- Path Creator : Spline package from the unity asset store

- Free SF Fighter : Fbx 3D model made by CGPitbull on TurboSquid

- Pro Sound Collection : SFX bundle from the unity asset store

- Skybox Series Free : Skybox bundle from the unity asset store

GitHub Link : https://github.com/Oscaro55/Mario_Tekar2.git

My Itch.io page : https://oscaro55.itch.io
